content.rendered:
Directed by Zoya Akhtar.

Written by Zoya Akhtar. Reema Kagti. Vijay Maurya. Cast (in credits order) complete, awaiting verification . Ranveer Sing. Alia Bhat. Siddhant Chaturved. Vijay Raa. Amruta Subhas. Jyoti Subhas. Vijay Varm. Kalki Koechli. Iqlaq Kha. Sheeba Chaddh.

Cast Ranveer Singh(Murad Ahmed / Gully Boy). Alia Bhatt(Safeena Firdausi). Siddhant Chaturvedi(MC Sher). Vijay Raaz(Aftab Shakir Ahmed). Amruta Subhash(Razia Ahmed). Jyoti Subhash(Murad’s Grandmother). Vijay Varma(Moeen Arif). Kalki Koechlin(Sky). Iqlaq Khan(Nasir (as Ikhlaque Khan)). Sheeba Chaddha(Hamida). Ayaan Zubair Rahmani(Safeena’s Brother). Rahul Piske(Chintoo). Nakul Roshan Sahdev(Salman). Vijay Maurya(Ateeq). Srishti Shrivastava(Albina). Mallika Singh(Suhani). Tina Bhatia(Parveen (as Tina Bhatiya)). Jasleen Royal(Juhi (Girl singing at college fest)). Soma Jain(Albina’s Mother (as Soma R Jain)). Sanjay Udeshi(Albina’s Father). Rahil Gilani(Rishi). Lucille Perrier(Tourist 3). Jan Graveson(Tourist 2). Richard Bhakti Klein(Tourist 1 (as a different name)). Prateek Kumar(Heckler 1 (as Pratik Kumar)). Rakesh Sharma(Tour Guide). Brian Nathan Siegal(British Tourist (as Brian Nathan)). Nitin Gupta(Heckler 2). Sushant Singh(Heckler 3). Michaela Talwar(Gemma). Svar Kamble(Suhail). Ashish Sawhny(Doctor (as Ashish Sawhney)). Abhinay Raj Singh(Patil bhai). Anil Khopkar(Narain’s Manager). Aishwarya Desai(Nikki Narain). Sonali Sachdev(Mrs Narain). Mohan Kapur(Mr. Narain). Dub Sharma(Dub Sharma). Emiway Bantai(Emiway Bantai). Krishna Kaul(Kr$na). 

Languages Hindi. English.

Producers Farhan Akhtar. Zoya Akhtar. Hetvi Karia. Saurabh Khandelwal. Stuti Ramachandra. Ritesh Sidhwani.

Production Excel Entertainment. Tiger Baby Films.
